Class CouponDBDAO

  • java.lang.Object
    • dbdao.CouponDBDAO
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CouponDAO

    public class CouponDBDAO
extends java.lang.Object
implements CouponDAO
    The class CouponDBDAO is part of myCouponProject the class CouponDBDAO communicates between the CouponFacade and SQL
    Author:
    Oshra & Shilo
    See Also:
    CouponFacade
